column3: Perhaps there's a way to compare the two systems' hostnames?\n
What about retuning a serialized version of the snapshot of wallet.dat through RPC, and let the RPC client store it somewhere?\n
That opens up a whole new level of security issues.\n
Would it make a large difference, security-wise? You can already request all the private keys through RPC isn't it?\n
Sending more than a few megabytes over RPC becomes a problem though - and there are certainly wallets that large out there.\n

Agreed.

What are we going to do here?

Closing.  Please either

1) Update code to require full pathname, or

2) Update code to send entire wallet via RPC, which @sipa admits is a mostly-rewrite
